6138.verse: جَزَآؤُهُمْ|Their reward|103|115|3078$عِندَ|(is) with|75|98|521$رَبِّهِمْ|their Lord -|95|118|54$جَنَّـٰتُ|Gardens|75|98|9435$عَدْنٍ|(of) Eternity,|107|130|7746$تَجْرِى|flow|81|104|242$مِن|from|50|62|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath them|133|144|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ|the rivers,|88|111|244$خَـٰلِدِينَ|will abide|87|110|1409$فِيهَآ|therein|66|89|253$أَبَدًا‌ۖ|forever.|72|95|4093$رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah (will be) pleased|164|176|5402$عَنْهُمْ|with them|86|96|2643$وَرَضُواْ|and they (will be) pleased|192|213|5403$عَنْهُ‌ۚ|with Him.|81|102|3938$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|85|28$لِمَنْ|(is) for whoever|126|147|1356$خَشِىَ|feared|73|83|3914$رَبَّهُۥ|his Lord.|76|76|2522$

6144.verse: يَوْمَئِذٍ|That Day|81|104|3485$يَصْدُرُ|will proceed|98|144|18281$ٱلنَّاسُ|the mankind|100|146|112$أَشْتَاتًا|(in) scattered groups|161|207|12677$لِّيُرَوْاْ|to be shown|102|125|18282$أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ|their deeds.|99|99|1459$

6145.verse: فَمَن|So whoever|98|108|402$يَعْمَلْ|does|70|89|4433$مِثْقَالَ|(equal to the) weight|162|181|4002$ذَرَّةٍ|(of) an atom|104|123|4003$خَيْرًا|good,|68|87|1388$يَرَهُۥ|will see it,|87|97|18147$

6151.verse: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ|Then penetrate thereby (in the) center|282|435|18291$جَمْعًا|(of) troops,|97|250|11034$

6154.verse: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed he (is),|146|179|1195$لِحُبِّ|in (the) love|102|168|18294$ٱلْخَيْرِ|(of) wealth|94|160|3143$لَشَدِيدٌ|(is) surely intense.|144|177|9528$

6138.verse: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

6139.verse: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

6140.verse: And the earth discharges its burdens

6141.verse: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

6142.verse: That Day, it will report its news

6143.verse: Because your Lord has commanded it.

6144.verse: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

6145.verse: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

6146.verse: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

6148.verse: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

6151.verse: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

6152.verse: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

6153.verse: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

6154.verse: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

6155.verse: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
